column5: Well heard on the news this morning that a 48 yr old male from stoney creek hamilton, Dale conchello has been missing since yesterday!  Was last seen around the port rowan erea of the inner bay!. I have seen search & rescue flying by my place all morning. Lets hope & pray they find him safe! There was no mention of pottahwk on the radio.
well lets hope they find him safe and sound!
i think ive heard of him i also live in stoney creek i believe hes a real estate agent or something i donno but i hope hes alright and they find him

hope they find him,and hes safe.my family was not so lucky,my bro was in a small plane that crashed into the pacific ocean near prince rupert b.c. they never found him.it left to many unanswered.my prays are sent to him and his family.
This topic is also on the Long Point board. It says that the search and rescue was called off at 2:30. Let's hope everything is OK.  http://www.longpoint.on.ca/forum/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=7062

Looks like this story has a tragic ending.  The missing boater's body has been found according to the Long Point Board http://www.longpoint.on.ca/forum/topic.asp?TOPIC_ID=7062.  Please be careful out there and remember to wear your life jacket, especially in rough water.

If you can't wear your PFD all the time at least wear it when the boat is moving.I have been in others boats and lets just say your PFD is useless in the boat storage compartment.I do wear my PFD almost all the time.Did you know 85% of boaters who drown were not wearing a PFD.  My next purchase will be a self inflating PFD the automatic model.SO sad.MTP
